user.name: Manish
user.title: Game Developer | Engineer
user.bio: Hi, I'm a Game Developer with a passion for creating immersive experiences. I specialize in Unity and Unreal Engine and I love bringing ideas to life through code and design.

micro-games.title: Micro Game 1: Galactic Racer
micro-games.description: A fast-paced micro-game developed in Unity. Features procedural track generation and advanced shader effects. The project includes comprehensive documentation and a post-mortem analysis.

micro-games.title: Micro Game 2: Neon Runner
micro-games.description: An endless runner with a retro-futuristic aesthetic. Built with Unreal Engine, it features dynamic obstacles and a synthwave soundtrack.

tech-demos.title: Tech Demo: Advanced AI
tech-demos.description: A technical demo showcasing advanced AI behaviors for NPCs in Unreal Engine. Includes flocking behavior, pathfinding, and decision trees. The code is well-documented and optimized for performance.

experimental.title: Experimental Project
experimental.description: An experimental VR project focused on realistic physics interactions. This project was a deep dive into the Unity Physics engine and XR Interaction Toolkit. Includes a detailed post-mortem on the challenges and learnings.

experimental.title: Experimental Project
experimental.description: An experimental VR project focused on realistic physics interactions. This project was a deep dive into the Unity Physics engine and XR Interaction Toolkit. Includes a detailed post-mortem on the challenges and learnings.

failure.title: Failure Project 1 Title
failure.description: An ambitious project that taught valuable lessons about scope management and technical challenges.
